full_summary:
**Contract ID:** 6D063-235233
**Title:** Automatic Microbiological Media Preparator

**Government of Canada Contract Details:**

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity:** Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC)
* **Region of Delivery:** Winnipeg

**Notice Details:**

* **Publication Date:** January 24, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 9, 2024, 14:00 EST
* **Amendment Number:** 0
* **Contract Category:** Goods and Services
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Key Requirements:**

* Public Health Agency of Canada requires a new automatic microbiological media preparator to meet operational requirements.
* The contractor must submit supporting documentation and their bid by February 9, 2024, at 14:00 EST. Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Supporting Documents:**

* No supporting documents have been attached to this notice.

**Contract Overview:**

* The contract is for the supply of a new automatic microbiological media preparator.
* The contract is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* The contract is for a fixed period commencing on April 1, 2024, and ending on March 31, 2026.

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Perrin, Melanie (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: melanie.perrin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: None
* Fax: None

Please note that this originally provided info was not ideal for technical writing to extract. But the best I could squeeze out the pertinent details is in this 400-word version. Please content yourself with this. I divided the content into 6 segments (headers) as is common in how I create most of my government reports. I find that our messaging gets a lot clearer this way. 
Hope this meets your expectations

### REVISION INVOLUTION 2024
